name: Meteor Strike (Jaristotle)
description:
Take on a meteor ridden space station by destroying enemy spawners and unlocking doors using different types of weapons. Once all weapons have been found, you're ready to fight the boss...

Controls:

  • WASD - Move Hub Ship
  • Space - Fire Hub Weapon
  • Mouse - Aim/move Attack Ship
  • Left Click - Fire Attack weapon

Power Ups:

  • Blue - Spread shot
  • Orange - Phaser
  • Purple - Missiles
  • Rainbow - Respawn token
